description.line1: As a thirsty person seeks water,
description.line2: so water seeks a thirsty person.
description.line3: As every man has his life
description.line4: form and mind to help others
description.line8: and not to help and not to
description.line12: is to help other living beings!
description.line14: with the best service to participate
description.line15: in whatever kind of help we can do
description.line17: even though we need innumerable help.

activities.activity1: On behalf of the Vasi Foundation, we visited the Nilampati Adivasi people to help them cultivate the land themselves.
activities.activity2: In Coimbatore district Neelampathi Adivasi village, Rangammal's land was provided with irrigation facility for agricultural use from a well that had not been pumped for more than 15 years. Vasi Trust Founder A. Yuvaraja (A) Arun and Trustee N. Mothi were members of the Trust.
activities.activity3: A meeting to guide the adivasi to farm their land in the village of Kokapatti Hill
activities.activity4: An awareness meeting was held in Motiyur Adivasi village, Coimbatore on economic progress and village practices.
activities.activity5: During my meeting with the Motiyur Adivasi people of Coimbatore district and their life
activities.activity6: A village meeting was held with the Motiyur Adivasi people
activities.activity7: When our trust introduced the situation of the area to the Puzhinjoor Adivasi people of Karnataka state
activities.activity8: While we heard about the living conditions of the people in the hilly villages in the Sirumugai area
activities.activity9: When village meeting and life guidance meeting was held with the Adivasi hill people of Lower Pillur in Pillur area of Coimbatore district.
activities.activity10: In the Adivasi hill village of Kiel Pillur, We provided agricultural support materials to the farmer Vellingiri.
activities.activity11: Vasi Trust Founder and Trustees Mr. Jegatheesan and Mr. Nagarajan along with the people of the area when they met the economically backward SC people in Kannapan Nagar, Coimbatore district.
activities.activity12: During a visit to Madurai Veeran Temple in Kamarajpuram area of Coimbatore, the local people met and inspected the area including Viswanathan Nagaraj Jagatheesan, founder and in-charge of the trust.
activities.activity13: When we went to provide food items on behalf of our trust as a sponsor for the temple festival at Pillur Dam.
activities.activity14: Sambath Kumar from Pannimadai area of Coimbatore has been given a license to operate motor vehicles by our trust as a service completely free of cost.

aboutus1.line3: The primary mission of this WASSE TRUST
aboutus1.line4: is to do good and charity to the people,
aboutus1.line5: considering the time, scope, purpose, place,
aboutus1.line6: and necessity to benefit the people.

aboutus2.line11: WASSE TRUST works for the most economically
aboutus2.line21: backward people, people who do not live
aboutus2.line31: together with all the people, people who live alone for many generations,
aboutus2.line41: and people who live in dense forest and
aboutus2.line51: forested mountains, to protect their life,
aboutus2.line61: health and prosperity, to take a big part
aboutus2.line71: in their development and to advance positive changes.
aboutus2.line121: Let's start a positive change today!
